summary:
Current CEO at NTT DATA Netherlands where NTT DATA started to establish its footprint back in 2014 with the aim of becoming one of the leaders in Consulting, IT and Outsourcing in this market.
  
NTT DATA is the 9th-leading IT Service company in the world. We work with our customers to innovate and offer the best quality. We are located in 50 countries and with more than 150.000 professionals, but as close to you as always.

During my career, I have developed several functions in multiple industries, such as financial institutions, real estate, transportation (airports and highways) and government institutions, always participating in critical transformation projects. Most of my experience, however, has been developed in the banking industry, where I have led banking units in several countries (i.e. Spain, Mexico, Italy, Andorra and Benelux), managing large IT and Operations transformation projects in Retail Banking, Private Banking and Financial Markets.
 
Throughout these years, I've had the chance to start new businesses and increase existing ones in different countries while leading teams in challenging and growing environments. From 1997 to 2002, I contributed on the creation of the banking unit in Barcelona. Then, for three years, I led the banking unit in the Mexican market, and before becoming CEO of NTT DATA Netherlands, I was in charge of this same unit in both Barcelona and Italy offices. Meanwhile, I was also in charge of the opening of Andorra's operations and the business development of the banking units across Europe.
